name: Permits Report
query:
select l.employee as 'كود الموظف::120', l.employee_name as 'إسم الموظف::300', 
if(l.is_early_leave=1,'مسائى','صباحى') as 'نوع الإذن::200', l.total_units as 'مدة الإذن::120', 
l.permit_date as 'التاريخ::100', l.permit_balance as 'الرصيد::120', l.description as 'ملاحظات::500'
from `tabPermit Application` l
where l.docstatus=1 and l.status='Approved' 
and l.permit_date>=%(from_date)s and l.permit_date<=%(to_date)s 
and l.employee in (select name from `tabEmployee` where company=%(company)s and business_unit=%(business_unit)s) 
order by permit_date, employee
